Package com.example.omninventory

Class ValueTextWatcher

java.lang.Object
com.example.omninventory.ValueTextWatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.text.NoCopySpan, android.text.TextWatcher
public class ValueTextWatcher extends Object implements android.text.TextWatcher
Custom TextWatcher that reformats any input entered into an EditText intended to hold currency values, resulting in text that is a valid string representation of an ItemValue (see ItemValue class).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.text.NoCopySpan
